title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 6-1.27 - Movable-bottom pools
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 6-1.27 - Movable-bottom pools

State Regulations

Movable-bottom floor pools shall be operated and maintained in accordance with special requirements specified in section
6-1.29, item 15.4, of this Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
6-1.27

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
